mapper.select: WITH ReplyCounts AS ( SELECT GNO, cat_group, COUNT(*) AS re_count FROM BOARD_CALL WHERE SUBJECT IS NULL AND DELCODE IS NULL GROUP BY GNO, cat_group ) SELECT --ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.GNO DESC) AS rownum, a.UNO, a.GNO, a.SUBJECT AS SUBJECTFULL, CASE WHEN LENGTH(a.SUBJECT) > 20 THEN SUBSTR(a.SUBJECT, 1, 19) || '...' ELSE a.SUBJECT END AS SUBJECT, a.ID, SUBSTR(a.IN_DATE,0,10) AS IN_DATE, a.REPLY_DEPTH, a.att_file, a.hit, a.EMPNM, rc.re_count, CASE WHEN a.nocode = '1' THEN 'notice' ELSE '' END AS nocode FROM BOARD_CALL a LEFT JOIN ReplyCounts rc ON a.GNO = rc.GNO AND a.cat_group = rc.cat_group WHERE a.CAT_GROUP = #{category} AND a.REPLY_DEPTH = 'A' AND a.DELCODE IS NULL AND a.SUBJECT IS NOT NULL and substr(a.in_date,0,10) > '2024-01-01' ORDER BY a.GNO DESC, a.REPLY_DEPTH
SELECT gno, uno, REPLY_DEPTH, CAT_GROUP, SUBJECT, EMPNM, IN_DATE, ID, CONTENT, ATT_FILE FROM BOARD_CALL WHERE CAT_GROUP = #{custCode} AND uno=#{id}
